mn18:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
mn18:2.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kapilavatthuṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
mn18:2.2_0: Kapilavatthusmiṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
mn18:2.3_0: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
mn18:3.1_0: Daṇḍapāṇipi kho sakko jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
mn18:3.2_0: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā yena beluvalaṭṭhikā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn18:3.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā daṇḍamolubbha ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
mn18:3.3_1: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho daṇḍapāṇi sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn18:4.1_1: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhati,
mn18:4.1_2: yathā ca pana kāmehi visaṁyuttaṁ viharantaṁ taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ akathaṅkathiṁ chinnakukkuccaṁ bhavābhave vītataṇhaṁ saññā nānusenti—
mn18:5.1_3: tivisākhaṁ nalāṭikaṁ nalāṭe vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍamolubbha pakkāmi.
mn18:6.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena nigrodhārāmo tenupasaṅkami;
mn18:6.3_0: “idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kapilavatthuṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
mn18:6.4_0: Kapilavatthusmiṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ divāvihārāya.
mn18:6.5_0: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdiṁ.
mn18:6.6_2: sakko jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
mn18:6.7_0: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā yena beluvalaṭṭhikā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
mn18:6.8_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā daṇḍamolubbha ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
mn18:6.10_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhikkhave, daṇḍapāṇiṁ sakkaṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn18:6.11_1: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhati,
mn18:6.11_2: yathā ca pana kāmehi visaṁyuttaṁ viharantaṁ taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ akathaṅkathiṁ chinnakukkuccaṁ bhavābhave vītataṇhaṁ saññā nānusenti—
mn18:6.13_4: tivisākhaṁ nalāṭikaṁ nalāṭe vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍamolubbha pakkāmī”ti.
mn18:6.14_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn18:7.1_1: bhagavā sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhati?
mn18:7.2_1: bhagavantaṁ kāmehi visaṁyuttaṁ viharantaṁ taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ akathaṅkathiṁ chinnakukkuccaṁ bhavābhave vītataṇhaṁ saññā nānusentī”ti?
mn18:8.2_0: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
mn18:8.4_0: Etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī”ti.
mn18:9.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
mn18:10.1_0: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
mn18:10.4_0: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
mn18:10.6_0: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti.
mn18:10.7_0: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā”ti?
mn18:10.9_0: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
mn18:10.10_0: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn18:11.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn18:11.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
mn18:11.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn18:11.3_2: bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn18:11.5_0: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
mn18:11.7_0: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti.
mn18:11.8_0: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
mn18:11.9_1: bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn18:11.11_0: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
mn18:11.13_0: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī”’ti.
mn18:11.14_0: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyāti?
mn18:11.15_0: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ etadahosi:
mn18:11.16_0: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
mn18:11.16_1: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn18:12.1_1: puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva mūlaṁ,
mn18:12.4_0: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi, yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha.
mn18:12.5_0: Yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn18:13.2_0: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi, yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāma.
mn18:13.3_0: Yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāma.
mn18:13.4_0: Api cāyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
mn18:13.5_0: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn18:14.2_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṁ.
mn18:15.1_1: bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn18:15.3_0: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ, esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
mn18:15.4_0: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti,
mn18:15.4_2: bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi—
mn18:16.1_7: yaṁ papañceti tatonidānaṁ purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti atītānāgatapaccuppannesu cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu.
mn18:16.2_0: Sotañcāvuso, paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn18:16.3_0: ghānañcāvuso, paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn18:16.4_0: jivhañcāvuso, paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn18:16.5_0: kāyañcāvuso, paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn18:16.6_7: yaṁ papañceti tatonidānaṁ purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti atītānāgatapaccuppannesu manoviññeyyesu dhammesu.
mn18:17.1_1: cakkhusmiṁ sati rūpe sati cakkhuviññāṇe sati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
mn18:17.6_0: So vatāvuso, sotasmiṁ sati sadde sati …pe…
mn18:17.10_0: manasmiṁ sati dhamme sati manoviññāṇe sati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.1_1: cakkhusmiṁ asati rūpe asati cakkhuviññāṇe asati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.2_0: Phassapaññattiyā asati vedanāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.3_0: Vedanāpaññattiyā asati saññāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.4_0: Saññāpaññattiyā asati vitakkapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.5_0: Vitakkapaññattiyā asati papañcasaññāsaṅkhāsamudācaraṇapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.6_0: So vatāvuso, sotasmiṁ asati sadde asati …pe…
mn18:18.10_0: manasmiṁ asati dhamme asati manoviññāṇe asati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.11_0: Phassapaññattiyā asati vedanāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.12_0: Vedanāpaññattiyā asati saññāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.13_0: Saññāpaññattiyā asati vitakkapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:18.14_0: Vitakkapaññattiyā asati papañcasaññāsaṅkhāsamudācaraṇapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn18:19.1_1: bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn18:19.2_1: purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
mn18:19.3_0: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti,
mn18:19.3_2: bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
mn18:19.4_0: Ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṁyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha.
mn18:19.5_0: Yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn18:20.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn18:20.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn18:20.2_1: bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn18:20.4_0: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
mn18:20.6_0: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti.
mn18:20.7_0: Tesaṁ no, bhante, amhākaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
mn18:20.8_1: bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn18:20.10_0: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
mn18:20.12_0: Etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī”ti.
mn18:20.13_0: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā’ti?
mn18:20.15_0: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
mn18:20.15_1: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ,
mn18:20.17_1: āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
mn18:21.2_3: ahampi taṁ evamevaṁ byākareyyaṁ yathā taṁ mahākaccānena byākataṁ.
mn18:21.3_0: Eso cevetassa attho. Evañca naṁ dhārethā”ti.
mn18:22.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn18:22.3_2: yato yato imassa dhammapariyāyassa paññāya atthaṁ upaparikkheyya,
mn18:22.5_0: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ, ānanda, imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva naṁ dhārehī”ti.
mn18:22.7_0: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
